statements: SELECT * FROM drug_manufacturing_processes
SELECT process_id, process_name, compliance_status FROM drug_manufacturing_processes
SELECT * FROM drug_manufacturing_processes WHERE compliance_status = TRUE
SELECT process_name, manufacturing_date FROM drug_manufacturing_processes ORDER BY manufacturing_date DESC
SELECT process_id, process_name FROM drug_manufacturing_processes WHERE manufacturing_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM drug_manufacturing_processes WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT process_name, manufacturing_date FROM drug_manufacturing_processes WHERE manufacturing_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM drug_manufacturing_processes ORDER BY last_update DESC;
SELECT process_id, process_name FROM drug_manufacturing_processes WHERE compliance_status = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM drug_manufacturing_processes WHERE compliance_status = TRUE AND process_name LIKE '%API%';
SELECT * FROM drug_manufacturing_processes;
SELECT process_id, process_name FROM drug_manufacturing_processes WHERE process_id = 1;
SELECT description, process_name FROM drug_manufacturing_processes WHERE process_name LIKE '%tablet%';
SELECT * FROM fda_regulations WHERE regulation_id = 3;
SELECT regulation_name AS name, regulation_description AS description FROM fda_regulations;
SELECT * FROM drug_manufacturing_processes WHERE process_id = 1;
SELECT process_name, description FROM drug_manufacturing_processes WHERE process_name LIKE '%tablet%' ORDER BY process_name ASC;
SELECT process_name, description FROM drug_manufacturing_processes WHERE process_id IN (2, 4, 6) ORDER BY process_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM fda_regulations WHERE regulation_id > 3 AND regulation_id < 8 ORDER BY regulation_id ASC;
SELECT regulation_name, regulation_description FROM fda_regulations WHERE regulation_name LIKE '%food%' ORDER BY regulation_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM manufacturing_sites;
SELECT site_name, location FROM manufacturing_sites WHERE site_id = 1;
SELECT site_name, location FROM manufacturing_sites ORDER BY site_name DESC;
SELECT process_name, description FROM manufacturing_processes;
SELECT * FROM manufacturing_logs WHERE start_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM manufacturing_sites WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT site_id, site_name FROM manufacturing_sites WHERE site_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT site_id, site_name, location FROM manufacturing_sites ORDER BY site_id DESC;
SELECT process_name, description FROM manufacturing_processes WHERE process_name LIKE '%assembly%';
SELECT site_id, COUNT(log_id) AS total_logs FROM manufacturing_logs GROUP BY site_id HAVING total_logs > 5;
SELECT * FROM manufacturing_sites;
SELECT site_name, site_location FROM manufacturing_sites WHERE site_id = 1;
SELECT manufacturer_name, contact_person_email FROM manufacturers ORDER BY manufacturer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE manufacturing_date >= '2022-01-01' AND manufacturing_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT ingredient_name, supplier_name, supplier_contact FROM ingredients WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'Supplier A%';
SELECT * FROM manufacturers WHERE manufacturer_name = 'ABC Inc.';
SELECT product_name, manufacturing_date FROM products WHERE site_id = 1 ORDER BY manufacturing_date DESC;
SELECT manufacturer_name, contact_person_email FROM manufacturers ORDER BY manufacturer_name ASC;
SELECT ingredient_name, supplier_name, supplier_contact FROM ingredients WHERE supplier_name LIKE '%Suppliers%';
SELECT site_name, site_location FROM manufacturing_sites WHERE site_id IN (SELECT site_id FROM products WHERE manufacturing_date >= '2022-01-01');
SELECT * FROM manufacturing_facility;
SELECT facility_name, location, capacity FROM manufacturing_facility WHERE capacity > 500;
SELECT drug_name, quantity, manufacturing_date FROM drug_manufacturing ORDER BY manufacturing_date DESC;
SELECT log_id, process_id, step_number, completion_date FROM manufacturing_logs WHERE step_number < 5;
SELECT parameter_name, result, remarks FROM quality_control WHERE result='pass';
SELECT * FROM manufacturing_facility WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT process_id, drug_name, manufacturing_date FROM drug_manufacturing WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY manufacturing_date DESC;
SELECT facility_name, location, capacity FROM manufacturing_facility WHERE capacity < 500 ORDER BY facility_name;
SELECT qc_id, parameter_name, result, remarks FROM quality_control WHERE result = 'Pass' AND remarks IS NULL;
SELECT process_id, step_number, step_description FROM manufacturing_logs WHERE completion_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY step_number ASC;
